schema.default: The subuser's username. This header generates the API call as if the subuser account was making the call.

trait_baseParams_aggregated_by.name: aggregated_by
trait_baseParams_aggregated_by.description: Dictates how the stats are time-sliced. Currently, `"total"` and `"day"` are supported.

trait_baseParams_start_date.name: start_date
trait_baseParams_start_date.description: Format: `YYYY-MM-DD`. If this parameter is included, the stats' start date is included in the search.

trait_baseParams_end_date.name: end_date
trait_baseParams_end_date.description: Format: `YYYY-MM-DD`.If this parameter is included, the stats' end date is included in the search.

trait_baseParams_timezone.name: timezone
trait_baseParams_timezone.description: [IANA Area/Region](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tz_database#Names_of_time_zones) string representing the timezone in which the stats are to be presented, e.g., "America/Chicago".

trait_pagination_page_size.name: page_size
trait_pagination_page_size.description: The number of elements you want returned on each page.

trait_pagination_page_token.name: page_token
trait_pagination_page_token.description: The stats endpoints are paginated. To get the next page, call the passed `_metadata.next` URL. If `_metadata.prev` doesn't exist, you're at the first page. Similarly, if `_metadata.next` is not present, you're at the last page.

trait_singlesendQueryParams_group_by.name: group_by
trait_singlesendQueryParams_group_by.description: A/B Single Sends have multiple variation IDs and phase IDs. Including these additional fields allows further granularity of stats by these fields.

trait_automationQueryParams_group_by.name: group_by
trait_automationQueryParams_group_by.description: Automations can have multiple steps. Including `step_id` as a `group_by` metric allows further granularity of stats.

trait_automationQueryParams_step_ids.name: step_ids
trait_automationQueryParams_step_ids.description: Comma-separated list of `step_ids` that you want the link stats for.

trait_singlesendQueryParams2_group_by.name: group_by
trait_singlesendQueryParams2_group_by.description: A/B Single Sends have multiple variation IDs and phase IDs. Including these additional fields allows further granularity of stats by these fields.

trait_statsAdvancedStatsBaseQueryStrings.name: start_date
trait_statsAdvancedStatsBaseQueryStrings.description: The starting date of the statistics to retrieve. Must follow format YYYY-MM-DD.

trait_statsAdvancedStatsBaseQueryStrings.name: end_date
trait_statsAdvancedStatsBaseQueryStrings.description: The end date of the statistics to retrieve. Defaults to today. Must follow format YYYY-MM-DD.

trait_statsAdvancedStatsBaseQueryStrings.name: aggregated_by
trait_statsAdvancedStatsBaseQueryStrings.description: How to group the statistics. Must be either "day", "week", or "month".

trait_statsAdvancedQueryStringsLimitOffs.name: limit
trait_statsAdvancedQueryStringsLimitOffs.description: The number of results to return.

trait_statsAdvancedQueryStringsLimitOffs.name: offset
trait_statsAdvancedQueryStringsLimitOffs.description: The point in the list to begin retrieving results.

trait_statsAdvancedQueryStringsLimitOffs.name: aggregated_by
trait_statsAdvancedQueryStringsLimitOffs.description: How to group the statistics. Must be either "day", "week", or "month".

trait_statsAdvancedQueryStringsLimitOffs.name: start_date
trait_statsAdvancedQueryStringsLimitOffs.description: The starting date of the statistics to retrieve. Must follow format YYYY-MM-DD.

trait_statsAdvancedQueryStringsLimitOffs.name: end_date
trait_statsAdvancedQueryStringsLimitOffs.description: The end date of the statistics to retrieve. Defaults to today. Must follow format YYYY-MM-DD.

trait_designsQueryStrings_page_token.name: page_token
trait_designsQueryStrings_page_token.description: token corresponding to a specific page of results, as provided by metadata

trait_designsQueryStrings_summary.name: summary
trait_designsQueryStrings_summary.description: set to false to return all fields

accountProvisioning_countParam.name: limit
accountProvisioning_countParam.description: The number of items to return

accountProvisioning_testHeader.name: T-Test-Account
accountProvisioning_testHeader.description: **OPTIONAL** Custom request header provided ONLY for a test account
